mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.rdt, A.hits, B.nm AS writernm, B.profileimg FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board(title, ctnt, iuser, icategory) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, ${iuser}, ${icategory})
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_board
title = #{title},
ctnt = #{ctnt},
lastip = #{lastip},
isdel = 1
WHERE iboard = ${iboard}
AND iuser = ${iuser}
